xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/957806-A Maiden's Prayer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/17Rg1NAGGwxjrLtt6OmiYcSJeJg.jpg Searching for a Claire Bible manuscript, Lina and the others find an ancient book describing a musical spell. The spell requires participants to dress up in costumes and chant together. Lina thinks the song being is a holy spell of magical protection but it turns out to be a lost festival song to summon holy light and flower petals. When she discoveres this discrepancy, she blows up everyone with a hastily cast Dragon Slave. A Maiden's Prayer
